reviews.review: Очень интересная игра, превосходство её над Portal (1 часть) в том, что в ней гораздо больше уровней, их можно создавать самому и с друзьями, тут головоломки не только для 1 человека, но и есть режим совместной игры, очень советую эту игру для развития мышления. Я считаю, что таких игр должно быть больше!

写在最前面：一定要先玩一代再来玩这代，这游戏剧情很重要！！！

这是一款独特的FPS游戏，不同于其他打打杀杀的FPS，它是一款闯关游戏，有些地方需要动脑子的，不是特别难，也不是特别容易，难度适中，但会让你有种停不下来的感觉。
This was a triumph. I'm making a note here...huge success.

Great follow up to the first game, more intriguing story and increased mechanics. I enjoyed my playthrough a lot, same as the old one. "A-ha! That should work!". Haven't tried co-op, will update if I have the chance to play it.

El primer juego donde un perro podría olerse su propio trasero. ¿Qué más se puede pedir?

Si vas a mirar los votos negativos del mismo es porque tienes predisposición para verlo negativo, o porque eres un antisistema. Eso está bien, más todavía si vas a jugar al portal donde intentarás, por todos los medios, no hacer caso a todas las personsa (¿Personas?) que te dicen lo que tienes que hacer.

Que, en la mayoría de los casos, será pedirte que te mueras.

10/10, y deja de mirar los votos negativos :)

If you're familiar with the Portal series, Portal 2 is an excellent continuation from the original Portal. 

Built on an updated engine, Portal 2 has improved portal mechanics and graphics from the original, and in general the runtime is longer.
Portal 2 also comes with a free set of authoring tools that are the same that come with Half-Life 2 and the Source SDK, so you can make maps for it easily.

很不错的一款游戏，很益智啊啊

依旧是解密逃脱，同时剧情比1更加丰富

个人感觉2明显比1简单，考操作的地方明显减少（也可能是玩了1已上手？），还有了辅助瞄准
关键是2常常大面积黑墙，能开门的白墙寥寥无几，简直变向直接告诉解法→_→，相比起来1“到处能开门”更易误导（但同时也让玩法更丰富，一关多解）。哪种更好就见仁见智咯。
但相对的2增加了许多新道具，镭射、光桥、跳板、凝胶、隧道等等，大大丰富了游戏内容，虽然一开始可能会因道具太多摸不着头脑，但只要搞清各自及相互的作用然后理清思路，真没啥难点。

PS.不知是我显示器问题还是游戏问题，我知道有些情节就是低亮度但也太黑了吧，简直和黑屏一样QAQ

In my opinion the best game ever made. Solo campaign is amazing. Co-op missions are hilarious and challenging. And there is milions of community made maps, both for solo and co-op. Literally endless hours of fun. 11/9 would recomend
My life got ruined after I bought this game, worth living to try it.

%75 yada %85 indirimde aldığım oyundur. Parasının hakkını veren bi oyundur.            Hikayesi karışık olduğu için detaya girmicem.      AMAÇ     Elimizdeki portal aletiyle yapay zekalı robotun fantazili bulmacalarını geçip buradan kurtulmaktır ve bunu yaparken başımızdan geçen olayları anlatır.       Labirent ve odadan kaçış gibi oyunları sevenler için öneririm.                  Oyun daha cok mantık ve hayal gücünüze yöneliktir.  Oyunda her buldunuz eşyanın bir amacı var ve bölümü geçmek için bunlara ihtiyacınız vardır.     Oyun hem eğlendirip hem de düşündürmesi bakımından güzeldir.   Bunun dışında oyunu multiolarak başkalarının yaptıgı labirentleri geçerek yada sizde bir labirent yapabilirsiniz.    Oyunda 2 yada 3 bölümde takılmam dışında  sıkılmadan ve gayet te eğlenerek bitirdim.

This is a very good game, it has good graphics, very well done level design and astonishing voice acting. Unlike the first Portal, this game has a longer campaign and much more backstory. Both co-op and test creation modes are very fun and give complement to the game. In short: I think it's one of the best puzzle games I've ever played and I'll certainly recommend it to anyone who still hasn't played it.
Fun game, wish i had more time to spending playing it XD

This is my all time favorite game, I've owned this on PS3 forever and for some reason, it was added to my library without putting in the key (which wasn't in the box) so I bought the two-pack so me and my friend could play together. So onto the review. 
Single player:
This is the main meat for me, I barely touched co-op because I'm a friendless bastard, and the story is my favorite in any video game ever.
Multiplayer: 
Prepare to hate whoever you play with, and make sure to stock up on Motrin because you'll need it.
So, why are you reading this? Go buy the bloody game!
